entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as a family name.

entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: The surname 'Gaunt' is used to refer to the family.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: A Muggle is a non-magical person.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin Gaunt is mentioned as the brother of Merope.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope Gaunt is mentioned as the sister of Morfin and daughter of Gaunt.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is a person who seems to be present in the scene but is not directly involved in the conversation.

entities.name: salazar slytherin
entities.description: Salazar Slytherin is mentioned as a pure-blood ancestor of Merope.

relationships.description: Gaunt is the parent of Merope, who is his daughter.
Morfin seems to be watching a Muggle with interest, which might imply a sibling-like behavior towards the Muggle.
Merope is shown to have romantic interest in a Muggle, as she is seen looking at him from her window.
Gaunt is the descendant of Salazar Slytherin.
